article_title: Four hostages freed as dozens killed and injured in Gaza.

article_title: Four hostages freed as dozens killed and injured in Gaza.
sentence: Dozens  of  people,  including  children,  have  been  killed  and  injured  in  the  area  where  the  operation  took  place,  with  images  and  footage  showing  significant  numbers  of  casualties.
